title: By Royal Command
description: James Bond’s every move is being watched. He alone holds the clue to a sinister plot that will bring bloodshed and carnage to his school…and his country. Forced to flee from Eton to Austria, James must leave behind everything he knows, with only a beautiful - and dangerous - girl by his side. Soon he is trapped in a deadly war of secrets and lies, as a nightmare reunion with a bitter enemy throws him once more into the path of death.With nowhere to run and no one to trust, James will have to uncover the truth behind an evil plot before all is lost.
author: Charlie Higson
